transcript:
Hello?
Hello?
Ji.
Hanji, Manish ji baat kar rahe hain Anika Traders se?
Ji.
Manish ji, main Reshu baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se sir. Actually aapne ek feedback share kiya hai hame no. Usi ka reason jaanna tha sir ki kahan pe matlab problem aa gayi ya aapne no feedback share kiya hai jo aapke account manager ki call pe.
Unke baaton se main satisfied nahi hu to jabardasti madam main ye satisfaction nahi le sakta.
Nahi nahi sir, baat bilkul thik hai. Sir main wohi jaanna chah rahi hu ki aisa kya unresolve issue reh gaya tha sir ya jo hum further improvement kar sakte hain ya further aapko help kar sakte hain sir.
Ab kya bolu madam ek hi baat ko char baar repeat karna mere ko bhi achcha nahi lagta na madam.
Ji sir, baat bilkul thik hai aapki. Service nahi liye rehte tab tak 50 call aata hai. Service lene ke baad koi nahi puchta ki customer ka kya chal raha hai kya nahi aur naye naye log ko account manager aap handling ke liye de dete hain.
Okay, sir matlab sabse pehla issue yahi hai ki account manager ki side se aapko call nahi aa raha hai aur service feedback wagera nahi liya ja raha hai aap se.
Nahi mil raha hai. Koi service feedback nahi hai. Pichhle ek mahine se aap dekhiye mera koi bhi customer ke sath koi call record hi nahi hoga.
Sir aapki jo last time account manager se baat hui thi, woh 8 October ko baat hui thi sir. Uske baad unhone aaj aap se baat kiya hai.
Ji, woh bhi kal maine request dala to aaj call hua hai.
Sir actually kal woh leave pe the Anurag, unki tabiyat thik nahi thi.
Han to wohi bola na, kal main request dal to aaj baat hua na, nahi to abhi tak to koi ye nahi tha.
Samajh sir I really apologize agar aapko is tarike ki problem hui hai sir. Main further Anurag ko make sure karti hu ki woh aapko ek bar call kar liya kare. Agar aap bataye sir aap kis din free rehte hain ya aapka koi suitable time ho. Matlab month mein sir waise to hum ek bar call karte hi hain but agar aapko kuch specific hai ki 15 din mein ya phir 20 din mein aapko ek bar call kar le to aap bataye Anurag ko main bol deti hu ki woh further usi hisab se aapko call kar liya karenge sir.
Ji 15 to 20 ke beech mein ek bar connect kar le kya problem chal raha hai kya nahi chal raha.
Ji, ji. Main ye make sure karti hu ki woh within 15 days sir woh aapko call kar le. Services ka feedback aap se le le. Ye main kar leti hu. Aur bataye sir dusra kya concern hai aapko?
Dusra mera wohi tha jaise ki mere paas Justdial ki bhi service rehti hai kuch bhi rehti hai. Usme kya hai profile aapka view mein jaise mere ko aaj offer lagana hai to main ek category ko kisi ko bhi aaj offer de sakta ki aaj 80% discount de 20% discount de. To aisa same facility mere ko IndiaMART mein nahi mil raha hai. Isi regarding main unse baat kiya to bole ki ye aapka catalog ka ye hai aapne benefit liya isliye usme aapko nahi milega ye cheeze.
Sir actually ye jo aap to matlab abhi service use hi kar rahe ho. Aapka sir jo control panel rehta hai sir aapko bhi pata hai sir wo template based control panel hai. Usme kuch additionally matlab update karne ke liye nahi rehta sir wo product detailing ki tarah hi aap dal sakte ho. Matlab usme aisa kuch special banner nikal ke nahi aata ya
summary:
Concerns:

- Account manager not calling regularly.

- No service feedback taken.

- Unable to give category-specific offers like Justdial.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Assured to have account manager call within 15 days.

- Explained IndiaMART control panel is template-based.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, feedback, service, offers, catalog
